episode.title: The “Press Real Hard” Era
episode.rawTitle: 215: ‘The “Press Real Hard” Era’ With Marco Arment
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Special guest Marco Arment returns to the show for a brief discussion. Topics include Apple’s OS development strategy, HomePod and Siri, the sad state of Apple TV apps, where to get a good cheesesteak, how to boil water, and more.
